allowDarkTabBarTooltip.message: Allow tab bar to use dark colour (light text on dark tab bar).

allowLightTabBarTooltip.message: Allow tab bar to use bright colour (dark text on light tab bar).

cannotFindElement.message: Cannot find the HTML element matching

colourForHomePage.message: Tab bar colour for home page can be configured in settings

colourForPlainTextViewer.message: Using colour for plain text viewer

colourIsAdjusted.message: The original colour has been adjusted to ensure minimum contrast

colourIsPickedFrom.message: Colour is picked from an HTML element matching

colourIsSpecified.message: Colour for this site is specified in the settings

colourPickedFromWebpage.message: Colour is picked from the web page

compatibilityModeTooltip.message: Instead of the theme API, use the HTML “theme-color” property to change the tab bar colour. This only works with certain browsers to a limited extent.

confirmResetAdvanced.message: Are you sure you want to reset the advanced settings?

confirmResetSiteList.message: Are you sure you want to reset the site list?

confirmResetThemeBuilder.message: Are you sure you want to reset the theme builder?

dynamicModeTooltip.message: Keeps updating tab bar colour while browsing within a web page.

errorOccured.message: An error occurred, using fallback colour

errorOccuredLocatingElement.message: An error occurred while looking for the HTML element matching

errorOccuredLocatingElementEnd.message: , colour is picked from the web page instead

extensionDescription.message: Changes the colour of Firefox theme to match the website’s appearance.

ignoreDesignatedThemeColourTooltip.message: Some websites provide a theme colour themselves. Turn on this option to ignore these colours.

ignoreThemeColourTitle.message: Ignore theme colour defined by the website

importFailed.message: Failed to import settings. Please try again.

minimumContrastTooltip.message: Set the minimum contrast ratio between the tab bar and text. The tab bar colour adjusts automatically if the ratio is unmet.

pageIsProtected.message: This page is protected by browser

reinstallTip.message: Preference data may be corrupted. If the issue persists, please reinstall the add-on. We apologize for the inconvenience.

reportAnIssue.message: Report an issue / submit a suggestion / translate this add-on

settingsAreExported.message: Settings have been exported to your download folder.

specifyColourForAddon.message: Click “Specify a color” to open settings and specify tab bar colour for pages related to

specifyColourForAddonTitle.message: Open settings and specify a colour to pages related to the add-on

themeColourIsIgnored.message: Theme colour defined by the website is ignored

themeColourIsUnignored.message: Theme colour defined by the website is used, instead of being ignored by default

themeColourNotFound.message: Theme colour is not found, colour is picked from the web page

useDefaultColourForAddon.message: Using specified colour for pages related to

useRecommendedColourForAddon.message: Recommended colour for pages related to

useThemeColourTitle.message: Use theme colour defined by the website

usingFallbackColour.message: No colour is available, using fallback colour

usingThemeColour.message: Using theme colour defined by the website
